xyz Technology Solutions.subject: Introduction and Inquiry for Software Development Opportunities
xyz Technology Solutions.body:
Hello,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is Subhiksha Seshadri, and I am a graduate student at NYU currently pursuing my MS in Computer Science. I came across XYZ Technology Solutions and was impressed by your commitment to driving digital transformation for clients through innovative technology solutions. It's inspiring to see how you empower organizations to elevate their business capabilities.

I am a Software Engineer with over 2 years of experience at Oracle, where I developed scalable Supply Chain Management solutions for over 40,000 global customers using Java, Spring Boot, and Oracle DB. Currently, I am exploring new Software Development Engineer opportunities where I can leverage my skills in Spring Boot, Node.js, React, and Next.js, along with my project experience in machine learning and AI technologies.

I have attached my resume for your review and would greatly appreciate any guidance or opportunities that may align with my background and interests at XYZ Technology Solutions.

Best regards,
Subhiksha Seshadri
Contact: +17189309779
LinkedIn: http://linkedin.com/in/subhiksha-seshadri/
